is a search engine for all public transport inside Sweden.

From the Landvetter and Gothenburg City airports, the airport bus to Gothenburg (going directly from the airport building) and then train is preferred. From Arlanda airport, there are SJ trains to Laxå and Töreboda, or to Örebro or Skövde and onward bus.

Tickets for Västtrafik can be bought by credit card onboard, but not for buses in Gothenburg. Pressbyrån (e.g. at Landvetter airport) and some other shops sell tickets. The airport bus need special tickets which are bought with credit card onboard. Read the
Inside the municipalities there are buses, all organized by Västtrafik; or Länstrafiken for Laxå.
